title: A Corpus of Grand National Assembly of Turkish Parliament's Transcripts

400 to 550 people are elected.

These texts.

Also, we do not extract the structure of the dialogue.
This is one of the things that we aim to do in future.
So there is a lot.
We have around 12,000 sessions.
They sum up to 200 million words.
And when we look at unique words, we have 600,000 of them.
But just looking at these numbers is not satisfying for us, so we wanted to test the coverage.

We first discarded unique words which AP at less than 10, so we got.
We reduced the number two 300,000.

As you might know, Turkish is one of the one of those languages.

True time we can validate this.

Appear after the 80s.

Specifically, we focused on these two words, members and military.

Internet not until 90s.

Comment to have this plot for his or her examination.
OK, so I conclude.
